hero.title: Gufasha Abahinzi
hero.description: Guhindura ubuhinzi bwawe ukoresheje ubwoba bwo gukurikirana ubutaka, gutanga amazi n'ubwoba, na AI ifasha. Jya mu mihindagurikire y'ubuhinzi muri Afurika.

problem.title: Ikibazo Dukemura
problem.subtitle: Abahinzi bo muri Afurika bahangana n'intambwe zikomeye zitera ubwoba mu bukungu n'ubuzima bwabo
problem.decliningSoilFertilityDesc: Guhinga bitazigama ubutaka byongera gutuma ubutaka butagira ubwoba, kandi byongera gutuma umusaruro ukagabanuka.
problem.poorIrrigationDesc: Gukoresha amazi nabi no kutagira sisitemu zikwiye zo gutanga amazi byongera gutuma ibimera bitagira ubwoba kandi amazi akaziruka.
problem.limitedGuidanceDesc: Uburyo bwa kera bukoresha gutekereza, bukaba butagira ubwoba bwo gufata inama zishingiye ku makuru.
problem.climateChangeDesc: Ntacyo dukemura, gukendera kw'ubutaka n'umusaruro muke bizongera gutuma ubuzima bw'abantu n'ubukungu bukomeza gukendera, bigatuma abaturage baba mu kaga kandi byongera gutera ubwoba mu bukungu.

whyChooseUs.title: Kuki twahisemo?
whyChooseUs.description1: Soilsmart yatangiye n'itekerezo rito: se ubutaka ubwabo bushobora kuyobora umuhinzi?
whyChooseUs.description2: Twabonye umutwaro munini w'ubukungu n'umuryango w'abaturage wavutse mu gukora ko ubwoba bw'ubutaka buhagaragara, bukagira akamaro, kandi bukaboneka — na niba utagira ubumenyi.
whyChooseUs.description3: Kuva mu bigo byo mu karere kugera ku masezerano y'isi yose, dukora ibikoresho bifasha abahinzi bato gukiza amazi, guhinga byinshi, no gukunda ubutaka bwabo kuza kuza.
whyChooseUs.sustainabilityDesc: Duzana ubwoba bw'ubuzima bw'igihe kirekire n'ubwoba bw'ibikoresho
whyChooseUs.communityDesc: Kwizera kw'abahinzi, n'abarinzi bo mu karere bakorana
whyChooseUs.innovationDesc: Gukoresha neza no gukoresha senseri zikora nta interineti, ahantu hose

objectives.title: Intego za SoilSmart
objectives.subtitle: Gufunga icyuho ukoresheje ibikoresho byoroshye by'ubwoba byo gukomeza no gukomeza ubutaka
objectives.monitorSoilHealthDesc: Gukurikirana mu gihe cy'ukuri ukoresheje senseri zoroshye.
objectives.automateDeliveryDesc: Gutanga amazi n'ifumbire mu buryo bw'ubwoba.
objectives.mobileAppDesc: Kugera ku bikoresho byose ugiye ukoresheje telefoni yawe nta interineti.

features.title: Reba Serivisi Zacu Zose
features.soilTestingDesc: Bona isuzuma ryuzuye ryo gukemura ubutaka ukoresheje tekinoloji yacu yihariye yo gukomeza ubuhinzi bwawe.
features.smartIrrigationDesc: Sisitemu yo gukoresha amazi y'ubwoba ikiza amazi kugeza kuri 30% mu gihe ikongera umusaruro.
features.cropMonitoringDesc: Gukurikirana ubwoba bw'ibimera mu gihe cy'ukuri ukoresheje AI n'inama.
features.npkFertilizersDesc: Inama z'ifumbire zihariye zishingiye ku butaka bwawe n'ibyo ukeneye.
features.waterManagementDesc: Uburyo bwiza bwo gutanga amazi no gukiza amazi mu buhinzi bw'ubwoba.
features.sustainableFarmingDesc: Uburyo bw'ubuhinzi bw'ubwoba bukunda ibidukikije kandi bukagira umusaruro mwinshi.
features.readyToTransform: Witeguye guhindura ubuhinzi bwawe ukoresheje serivisi zacu?

howItWorks.title: SoilSmart Ikora Ite?
howItWorks.subtitle: Tangira mu nzira enye zoroshye kandi uhindure uburyo bwawe bwo guhinga
howItWorks.step1Desc: Kora konti yawe kandi ushyiremo senseri zoroshye za IoT mu mirima yawe.
howItWorks.step2Desc: Gucunga umwirondoro w'ubuhinzi bwawe, ubwoko bw'ibimera, n'ibyo ushaka mu porogaramu.
howItWorks.step3Desc: Kurikirana makuru mu gihe cy'ukuri, kwakira inama za AI, no gutanga amazi mu buryo bw'ubwoba.
howItWorks.step4Desc: Koresha umusaruro wongewe, amafaranga yagabanutse, n'ubuhinzi bw'ubwoba.

mobileApp.title: Kuramo Porogaramu ya Telefoni ya SoilSmart
mobileApp.description: Gucunga ubuhinzi bwawe ugiye. Kurikirana ubwoba bw'ubutaka, kwakira inama za AI, no guhuza n'umuryango w'abahinzi — byose ugiye ukoresheje telefoni yawe.

cta.title: Dukure Tugira Ubwoba!
cta.subtitle: Ufite ibibazo cyangwa ukeneye ubufasha? Uzuza foroma hepfo kandi itsinda ryacu rizagusubiza mu myaka 24.

footer.description: Gufasha abahinzi bo muri Afurika ukoresheje ibikoresho byoroshye by'ubwoba byo gukomeza ubuhinzi no gukomeza umusaruro.
footer.copyright: © {{year}} Echo Solutions Ltd. Uburenganzira bwose burabitswe.

dashboard.title: Ikibaho
dashboard.subtitle: Inkuru y'ubutaka bwawe buri munsi, ikoresha senseri z'ubwoba.
dashboard.addYourFirstTask: Ongeramo inshingano yawe ya mbere kugira ngo utangire
dashboard.newAISoilAnalysis: Guhindura Gushya kwa AI Gukemura Ubutaka
dashboard.newAISoilAnalysisDesc: Bona ubwoba bw'ubwoba bw'ubutaka bukwiye ukoresheje guhindura gushya kwa AI.
dashboard.rainyWeekAheadDesc: Inkuru y'ibihe igaragaza ko imvura izaba mu cyumweru. Tegeka neza.
dashboard.join30DayChallengeDesc: Komeza ubwoba bw'ubutaka bwawe mu minota 30 gusa ukoresheje gahunda yacu.
dashboard.increaseIrrigationDesc: Ubwoba bw'amazi mu Gice 1 bugeze munsi y'ubwoba bw'ubwoba

tasks.title: Inshingano
tasks.subtitle: "Ni iki nkora uyu munsi?" - ukubona kimwe, igisubizo kimwe.
tasks.suggestionText: Wibuke gufata byawe ukongeramo ifumbire ejo.
tasks.suggestionReminders: Iki cyumweru ni cyiza cyo guhinga ibigori - azote mu butaka bihagije.
tasks.deleteConfirmMessage: Iki gikorwa kizasiba inshingano/ibyibutso byuzuye. Wizeye ko ushaka gukomeza?

monitoring.title: Ubutaka bwawe
monitoring.subtitle: Reba ubwoba bw'ubutaka bwawe kandi umenye ibyo bakeneye.
monitoring.irrigationAlertDesc: Ubwoba bw'amazi bukabije buhagaze. Ubwoba bw'ubu bukiri hejuru y'ubwoba bw'ubwoba. Kugabanuka kw'amazi.
monitoring.fertilizerScheduleDesc: Koresha ifumbire ifite azote mu cyumweru. Ubwoba bw'ubwoba bukomeje.
monitoring.weatherAdvisoryDesc: Wirinde gutanga amazi mu bihe by'ikiguri. Tegeka neza.

reports.title: Raporo
reports.subtitle: Isuzuma ryuzuye ryo gukemura ubutaka n'amakuru y'ubuhinzi.

messages.title: Ubutumwa
messages.selectConversation: Hitamo ikiganiro kugira ngo utangire kuvugana

aiChat.title: Kuvugana na SoilSmart AI
aiChat.subtitle: Inkuru y'ubutaka bwawe buri munsi, ikoresha senseri z'ubwoba.

community.title: Ikigega cy'Abahinzi
community.subtitle: Huza n'abahinzi bo mu muryango wawe.
community.whatsOnMind: Ni iki kiri mu mutwe wawe?

settings.title: Gucunga
settings.subtitle: Guhindura uburyo bwawe - porogaramu yawe ni uko ushaka.
settings.taskRemindersDesc: Kwakira amatangazo ku bijyanye n'inshingano zitegereje
settings.systemAnnouncementsDesc: Kwakira amatangazo ku bijyanye n'amakuru y'ubwoba n'amatangazo

profile.title: Umwirondoro w'Umuhinzi
profile.subtitle: Gucunga amakuru y'umwirondoro wawe n'amakuru y'ubuhinzi

notifications.title: Amatangazo
notifications.allCaughtUp: Wujuje byose! Subira inyuma hanyuma wongere.
